text: Sea Sorrow is a 2017 British documentary film about child refugees in the European migrant crisis, directed by Vanessa Redgrave. It was shown in the Special Screenings section at the 2017 Cannes Film Festival. On review aggregator Rotten Tomatoes, the film holds an approval rating of 67% based on 12 reviews, with an average rating of 5.4/10. ==Cast== * Ralph Fiennes as Prospero * Emma Thompson as Sylvia Pankhurst ==See also== * Fire at Sea * It Will Be Chaos * Human Flow * Inside Europe: Ten Years of Turmoil ==References== ==External links== * Category:2017 films Category:2017 documentary films Category:British films Category:British documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Documentary films about child refugees Category:Works about the European migrant crisis Category:2017 directorial debut films
title: Sea Sorrow
